poem.title: DWEM Wedding
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: The trouble is I plug my nose to sneeze (I'm learning manners) and My lung (the one that's left) comes out My lug (the right one); time Perhaps for a cochlear implant in The spare, so when I take the lunge I mean the plunge in church, and leave My trusty crutch to cling, I know When down the aisle to lurch and when to say I do.
